data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 1,800 souls living in the state of Garff with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Garff, Isle of Man
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 1,018 cultural Christians in the state of Garff to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 11 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Garff, Isle of Man the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Garff.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Laxey
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Laxey, Garff, Isle of Man.
Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Garff, Isle of Man.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 11 neighbors who are far from you in Garff. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Garff, Isle of Man that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.
